content: X-MW ALH CL 3/8’’ Wire hanger system Wire hanger system for electrical and mechanical trapeze and rectangular HVAC applications, installed using powder-actuated fastening tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Wire suspension system- - - ### FEATURES:Features Shorter installation time – wire suspension kits give you a much faster alternative to threaded rod Easier to adjust – self-closing wire lock can be adjusted tool-free, making levelling, retrofitting and long drop lengths much simpler Aesthetic – wire rope suspension is a discreet installation method for exposed building services and open soffits Compatible with strut channels and MVA ventilation hardware – you can get solutions for virtually every MEP installation from one supplier Can be fastened while standing on the floor using the DX pole tool Applications Suspending struts carrying HVAC fixtures, including spiral and rectangular ductwork to the concrete base material Suspending rectangular HVAC from the ceiling using MVA replacing the strut Suspending struts carrying electrical metal tubes, cable trays, cable baskets to the concrete base material Suspending lighting from ceiling Suitable for use in dry, indoor environments only For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: HVAC connections Material: Carbon steel For use with (tools): DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 Technical Data | Application | HVAC connections | Material | Carbon steel | For use with (tools) | DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Concrete (pre-cast), Concrete (normal-weight over metal deck), Steel | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2325736 - Wire hanger system X-MW ALH27 CL 20ft - Package Size 20 pc - 2325734 - Wire hanger system X-MW ALH27 CL 6ft/2m - Package Size 30 pc - 2325735 - Wire hanger system X-MW ALH27 CL 10ft/3m - Package Size 30 pc - 2325737 - Wire hanger system X-MW ALH32 CL 10ft - Package Size 30 pc - 3762219 - X-MW ALH27 CL 6ft/2m w/ DX351-ME - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DX351 Basic unit - 1x X-P8S-351 Piston - 1x X-FG8ME351 Fastener guide - 1x COUPLING NUT (REPAIR PART) - 2x SPRING 0.5X5.3X19 (REPAIR PART) - 4x SCREW DELTA-PT 35 X 11 - 1x DX 351 Cleaning Kit - 1x DX 351 Tool case - 300x Cartridge 6.8/11 M10 .27 cal C-T red - 300x Wire hanger system X-MW ALH27 CL 6ft/2m - 1x Modular pole tool X-PT 351 - 3762220 - X-MW ALH27 CL 10ft/3m w/ DX351-ME - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DX351 Basic unit - 1x X-P8S-351 Piston - 1x X-FG8ME351 Fastener guide - 1x COUPLING NUT (REPAIR PART) - 2x SPRING 0.5X5.3X19 (REPAIR PART) - 4x SCREW DELTA-PT 35 X 11 - 1x DX 351 Cleaning Kit - 1x DX 351 Tool case - 300x Cartridge 6.8/11 M10 .27 cal C-T red - 300x Wire hanger system X-MW ALH27 CL 10ft/3m - 1x Modular pole tool X-PT 351
